column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな
メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き
今、協会から連絡があった。
column5: The Association just got in touch.
column11: The Association just got in touch.

column4: オートマンが進撃を開始した。
column5: The Automen have begun their advance.
column11: The Automen have begun their advance.

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中軽い驚きＬ

世界各地に
/c5オートマンの大軍団/c3が
あらわれているらしい。
column5: A /c5large army of Automen/c3 has appeared in different places across the world.
column11: A /c5large army of Automen/c3 have appeared in various places throughout the world.

column4:
すべての軍団を率いているのは、
あの/c5人形王/c3だ。
column5: They're all led by the /c5Puppet King/c3.
column11: They're all being lead by the /c5Mech King/c3.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中苦しい

この大陸のすべてが
脅威にさらされている。
各地で戦いが始まった。
column5: The entire continent is under threat. Fighting's already broken out elsewhere.
column11: The entire continent is under threat. The fighting has already begun elsewhere.

column4:
この街にもオートマン軍団が
向かっているらしい。
column5: And now the Automan army is headed for this town.
column11: And now the Automen army are headed for this town.

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中苦しい

これからいったい……
どうすればいいの？
column5:
If it's come to this...
what in the world are we supposed to do?
column11:
Now that it's come to this...
What the heck are we supposed to do?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中苦しい

column5: The only thing we can do: fight.
column11: The only thing we can do, fight.

column4:
このままでは、家も畑も工房も、
すべては破壊される。
column5: At this rate, our homes, our fields, the workshop -- all will be destroyed.
column11: At this rate, our home, the field and workshop, will all be destroyed.
